operations with wfunc collections
[function for approximation (wfunc)]


Functions

bool surfit::wfuncs_delall ()
 removes all wfunc's from surfit_wfuncs
bool surfit::wfuncs_del (int pos)
 removes wfunc from surfit_wfuncs at "pos" position
bool surfit::wfuncs_load (const char *filename, const char *wfuncname=0)
 loads wfunc from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_wfuncs
bool surfit::wfuncs_load_grd (const char *filename, REAL weight, const char *wfuncname=NULL)
 loads wfunc from SURFER grd file (ASCII format) and adds it to surfit_wfuncs
bool surfit::wfuncs_unload (const char *name)
 removes first wfunc from surfit_wfuncs named with "name"
wfunc * surfit::wfuncs_at (int pos)
 returns wfunc at "pos" position from surfit_wfuncs
wfunc * surfit::wfuncs_first ()
 returns first wfunc from surfit_wfuncs
wfunc * surfit::wfuncs_last ()
 returns last wfunc from surfit_wfuncs
int surfit::wfuncs_size ()
 returns amount of wfunctions in surfit_wfuncs
int surfit::wfuncs_info ()
 prints information about wfunctions in surfit_wfuncs
